item.description:
Hey guys and gals! Can you believe IT'S ALMOST SUMMER, YAHOO!  Come join us at Captain's Cove Seaport, our tiny slice of Summertime heaven, as we dance the afternoon away to the awesome sounds of

GOOD N PLENTIE!!

 

 

This is a Multi-Group Meetup with 9 other single groups attending so get ready to mix and mingle with other singles Fairfield, Westchester and New Haven Counties. We will start gathering at 1 PM for Munching n Mixing before the music starts. Bring a friend, a lawn chair and relax with all of us by the harbor at one of our most popular events!

 

GOOD AND PLENTIE

This highly talented and experienced eight piece band, complete with lead front male & female vocalists, horn section and accomplished rhythm section delivers a first-class performance that makes Good and Plentie one of the most in-demand bands in the New York metro area. Over the years, the band has entertained thousands from the stages of Atlantic City and Foxwoods Casinos to the exquisite ballrooms of New York's finest hotels for corporate and other special events.

With an exceedingly diverse and extensive repertoire, the band's versatility can accommodate various musical tastes and please countless of audiences. Good and Plentie can play intimate venues, casinos and nightclubs along with large ballrooms and concert halls with equal effectiveness and ease.

Since 1982, Captain’s Cove Seaport has grown from a vacant lot and a handful of slips to one of Connecticut’s premier tourist attractions and seaport complexes.  Located on Historic Black Rock Harbor, we are an active maritime and amusement center.
So.... forget about the lawn, leave your high heels at home and come on down to “The Cove”!

 

PLEASE GET THERE EARLY TO HELP US HOLD DOWN THE PICNIC TABLES (you can also bring a lawn chair)! THIS IS A POPULAR BAND SO THE JOINT WILL BE JUMPING! ALSO, IF YOU GET THERE EARLY IT'S A GREAT WAY TO MEET & MINGLE WITH EVERYONE BEFORE THE MUSIC STARTS BECAUSE ONCE THAT HAPPENS, MOST OF US WILL BE ON THE DECK, DANCING!!!!

There will be a $1.00 Event Fee so please pay as you arrive and pick up a name tag.

We love your company so come and have a great time with us!!!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup Signs and the Red and White Balloons.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: ALMOST SUMMER @ Captain's Cove with GOOD AND PLENTIE!
